version_description:
New chapters every week！
CAMPUS PULSE
It's welcome week at Kensley University, and you've just been promoted to feature writer for the Daily Pulse! Who will you meet at the Kensley rooftop party, and can you handle the heat...?
﻿
SEEING RED
You know you're going to die... and then your world turns red. Being a vampire isn't what you expected... You need to learn fast and trust no one. You're still being hunted.
﻿
NO BUSINESS LIKE SHOW BUSINESS
Today, you have the biggest audition of your life! Will you land a role in Aaron Santos' hot new Broadway musical? It's time for you to sing, dance, and act your way to stardom!.
﻿
FORBIDEEN DESIRE
It's your first time entering the fetish scene. Hot encounters will follow when a dashing masked man helps you explore your wildest fantasies, but what will happen when you learn his identity?
